definition: intentional/deliberate/on purpose
surname Cheng
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth
heart/mind/intention/center/core/CL:顆|颗[ke1],個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: We don't know if it was done by accident or by design.
sentences.chinese: 我們不知道那是偶爾的，還是成心的。

sentences.english: Her spoiling my dress was deliberate.
sentences.chinese: 她是成心把我的衣服弄髒。

sentences.english: In so many loving accompanied by my life's been very meaningful.
sentences.chinese: 在恁地多喜好陪伴下我的生活過的很是成心義。

sentences.english: Light mean to inform and micah said repair 2 and XiaShi is unmarried couples relationship.
sentences.chinese: 光成心通知亞彌說修二和夏實是未婚夫妻關係。

sentences.english: Product such as mean in quilt left on lipstick print lips.
sentences.chinese: 品如成心在被子上留下了口紅的脣印。

sentences.english: The scarf back to ChengYou HuiZhen, induction difficult of HuiZhen mean to avoid him.
sentences.chinese: 承佑把領巾還給惠珍，感應爲難的惠珍成心規避他。

sentences.english: Those who created the virus are deliberately making fun of people.
sentences.chinese: 這是那些製造病毒的人成心搞惡作劇。

sentences.english: Criminal responsibility shall be borne for intentional crimes.
sentences.chinese: 成心犯罪，應當負刑事責任。

definition: deliberately
to show clearly
to ask a question, already knowing the answer
to pick fault with/to spot the differences/to nitpick/to pick a quarrel/to find complaint with
to have bad intentions
to bring trouble on oneself
variant of 找茬[zhao3 cha2]
to use public office to avenge private wrongs
unable to tell good from bad (idiom)/undiscriminating
lit. mention the pot that doesn't boil (idiom); to touch a sore spot/to talk about sb's weak point

definition: to look for employment/to pick a quarrel
to harbor (evil) intentions/to be bent on/a tranquil heart or mind
probably/perhaps/could it be that...?
